title: Hybrid workers don't want to return to the office. But soon, they might have to
description: As energy bills skyrocket and companies brace themselves for a recession, hybrid work might be about to face its biggest challenge.

title: iPhone 14 early hands-on: The camera is where all the Action is
description: The iPhone 14 doesn't have as many upgrades as the iPhone 14 Pro, but if camera quality is your main focus, then you're in luck.

title: I had a nightmare about Apple's iPhone 14 Dynamic Island (so I contacted Apple)
description: Dynamic Island is so unexpected. It's so clever. But might there be one more thing that you wish was one less thing?

title: More than 20 people stood in line at the supermarket. No one wanted self-checkout
description: Technology is supposed to solve so many things. Somehow, self-checkout isn't always working.

title: A famous actor bought a TV at Best Buy. Now he's mad he didn't go to Costco
description: When someone famous rages against your service, how should you react? In Best Buy's case, it didn't.
